summary: E-commerce website with product catalog and hexagonal pattern design. Removing cart functionality as it's not needed.
architectural_notes: Product catalog website with hexagonal pattern design

existing_features.title: Remove the CartContext provider and all cart state management logic from frontend/src/contexts/CartContext.tsx
Remove the Cart component from frontend/src/components/Cart.tsx that displays cart items, quantity controls, and checkout button
Remove the CartButton component from frontend/src/components/CartButton.tsx that shows cart item count and opens cart sheet
Remove CartButton from the Header component in frontend/src/components/Header.tsx
Remove all 'Add to Cart' buttons and cart-related functionality from the ProductCard component in frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx
Update the Checkout page in frontend/src/pages/Checkout.tsx to remove dependencies on cart state and cart-related UI
Update PaymentSuccess page in frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccess.tsx to remove cart clearing logic and cart dependencies
Remove the Payment component from frontend/src/components/Payment.tsx that creates Stripe checkout sessions using cart items

new_feature_requests.summary: Remove all cart functionality and CartProvider code
